TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AuthorizationContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供授权事件的上下文信息。

span.span: Provides context information of an authorization event.

summary.span: 这包括表示该调用方的主体，请求的资源和执行的操作。

span.span: This includes the principal that represents the caller, the resource that is being requested, and the action that is being performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示的声明授权管理器的实现使用的上下文类中，以确定是否应授权主体 （主题） 上给定的资源执行指定的操作。The class represents the context that is used by a claims authorization manager, an implementation of the class, to determine whether a principal (subject) should be authorized to perform a specified action on a given resource. 声明授权管理器的计算结果中的授权上下文方法并拒绝或授予的访问，声明的基础提供的主体。The claims authorization manager evaluates the authorization context in the method and either denies or grants access based on the claims presented by the principal. 属性包含为其授权正在被请求，该主体属性包含在其授权主体，该资源和属性包含的操作，主体想要在资源上执行。The property contains the principal for which authorization is being requested, the property contains the resource on which the principal is being authorized, and the property contains the actions that the principal intends to perform on the resource. 资源和操作表示为一系列声明;但是，在大多数情况下，每个集合包含单个声明。Both the resource and the action are represented as a collection of claims; however, in most cases, each collection contains a single claim. ## Examples 在中使用的代码示例主题中获取`Claims Based Authorization`示例。The code example that is used in the topic is taken from the `Claims Based Authorization` sample. 此示例提供的自定义声明授权管理器，可授权主体根据在配置中指定的策略。This sample provides a custom claims authorization manager that can authorize subjects based on a policy that is specified in configuration. 此自定义管理器包含三个基本组件： 一个类派生自实现管理器中，`ResourceAction`类对资源和操作，并读取和编译中指定的策略的策略读取器配置文件。This custom manager consists of three basic components: a class derived from that implements the manager, the `ResourceAction` class that pairs a resource and an action, and a policy reader that reads and compiles policy that is specified in the configuration file. 此编译的策略可能，然后通过声明授权管理器用于评估一个主体，以便授予对资源的访问权限。This compiled policy can then be used by the claims authorization manager to evaluate a principal in order to authorize access to resources. 为了简洁起见，并显示不是所有元素。Not all elements are shown for the sake of brevity. 有关此示例，并提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关在何处下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示自定义声明授权管理器的方法。The following code shows the method for the custom claims authorization manager. 根据资源和操作中指定的一个函数的计算结果为该主体调用。A function that evaluates the principal based on the resource and action specified in the is invoked. 此函数返回`true`或`false`，其中授予或拒绝访问权限的主体。This function returns either `true` or `false`, which either grants or denies access to the principal. [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/myclaimsauthorizationmanager.cs#3)] [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/myclaimsauthorizationmanager.cs#5)] 以下 XML 显示了在配置中指定的授权策略的示例。The following XML shows an example of the authorization policy that was specified in configuration. 在第一个策略中，主体必须拥有一个指定的声明，以便在指定资源上执行指定的操作。In the first policy, the principal must possess one of the specified claims in order to perform the specified action on the specified resource. 在第二个策略中，主体必须拥有两个声明，以便能够指定资源执行指定的操作。In the second policy, the principal must possess both claims to be able to perform the specified action on the specified resource. 在所有其他主体会自动授予访问权限，而不考虑它拥有的声明。In all others, the principal is automatically granted access regardless of the claims it possesses. ```xml ... ```

param.span: 其授权要被核对的主体。

span.span: The resource for which the principal is to be authorized.

param.span: 该资源被指定作为名称声明的值。

span.span: The resource is specified as the value of a name claim.

span.span: The action to be performed on the resource.
